price: 24. Bino mibale, bobwaka mopagano mpe motomboki okati na lifelo,
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
